casebody.data:
No. 10-7155. Elwood Patrick Hopkins, Petitioner v. David DiGuglielmo, Superintendent, State Correctional Institution at Graterford, et al. 562 U.S. 1146, 131 S. Ct. 921,

178 L. Ed. 2d 768,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 59. January 10, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.
